mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHECKLIST(CHECK_SEQ, CHECK_NAME, ISCHECKED, CARD_SEQ) VALUES(nextval('check_seq'), #{checkList.check_name}, 0, #{checkList.card_seq})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CURRVAL) FROM SEQUENCES WHERE NAME='CHECK_SEQ'
SELECT CHECK_SEQ, CHECK_NAME, ISCHECKED FROM CHECKLIST WHERE CARD_SEQ = #{param1} ORDER BY CHECK_SEQ DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CHECKLIST SET ISCHECKED = #{ischecked} WHERE CHECK_SEQ=#{check_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHECKLIST WHERE CARD_SEQ = ANY (SELECT CARD_SEQ FROM KANBANCARD WHERE PROJECT_SEQ = #{param1})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHECKLIST WHERE ISCHECKED = 1 AND CARD_SEQ = ANY (SELECT CARD_SEQ FROM KANBANCARD WHERE PROJECT_SEQ = #{param1})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CHECKLIST WHERE ISCHECKED = 0 AND CARD_SEQ = ANY (SELECT CARD_SEQ FROM KANBANCARD WHERE PROJECT_SEQ = #{param1})

SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'TOTAL', COUNT(IF(ISCHECKED=1,ISCHECKED,NULL)) AS 'ISCHECKED', C.CARD_SEQ FROM CHECKLIST C JOIN KANBANCARD K ON C.CARD_SEQ=K.CARD_SEQ WHERE K.PROJECT_SEQ=#{projectNum} GROUP BY C.CARD_SEQ
